decision_conditions:
The applicant is informed that for the avoidance of doubt the details approved by this notice are as follows:

Proposed Basement Drainage Scheme (2038.03.03.Drn01.MH.021) 
Proposed Ground Floor Drainage Scheme (2038.03.03.Drn01.MH.022 Rev D) 
Proposed First Floor Drainage Scheme (2038.03.03.Drn01.MH.023) 
Bay Cladding and Junction Detail (2038.03.03.Pln01.210) 
received the 19th June 2025;

Cover Letter 
Entrance Bay Junction Detail (2038.03.03.Pln01.211.A) 
Rear Extension Wall Treatment (2038.03.03.Pln01.213) 
Proposed North Elevation (2038.03.03.Pln01.MH.060.H) 
Proposed East Elev Partial Section (2038.03.03.Pln01.MH.061.1.B) 
Proposed East Elevation (2038.03.03.Pln01.MH.061.I) 
Proposed West Elevation (2038.03.03.Pln01.MH.062.E) 
Proposed South Elevation (2038.03.03.Pln01.MH.067.C) 
received the 31st July 2025; and

Schedule of Materials and Finishes (Main House)
received the 12th August 2025.
description: Details pursuant to condition C1 - details required, of planning permission 24/2400/LBC
